Posts.EditableText:
I am trying to execute a .js script from within squiffy, but I can't get anything to work.

The documentation for squiffy states that,

      @import my_script.js

... should be able to import a .js script, providing you are using the CMD version of Squiffy, but having installed CMD-Squiffy, I find the command is still not recognised?
Posts.HTML:
I am trying to execute a .js script from within squiffy, but I can't get anything to work.

The documentation for squiffy states that,

  @import my_script.js

... should be able to import a .js script, providing you are using the CMD version of Squiffy, but having installed CMD-Squiffy, I find the command is still not recognised?
